Assess all 
parameters that 
require a vaginal 
examination at the

In the active first 
stage of labour, plot 
“X” in the cell that 
matches the time 
and the cervical 
dilatation each 
time you perform a 
vaginal examination.
In the second stage, 
insert “P” to indicate 
when pushing 
begins.
Alert values for first stage:
5 cm = ≥6 h (cervical 
dilatation remains at 5 cm 
for 6 or more hours)
